snippet: A defense lawyer for Walid bin Attash has filed the motion, saying that a prosecutor’s comments on a Sept. 11 case were undermining the right of her client to a fair trial.
abstract: Defense lawyers for Walid bin Attash, one of five Guantanamo Bay detainees charged with aiding Sept 11 terrorist attacks, are seeking to muzzle chief military commissions prosecutor Brig Gen Mark S Martins; say his comments defending tribunals system are unethical and that they are undermining their client's right to fair trial.
lead_paragraph: A defense lawyer for Walid bin Attash has filed the motion, saying that a prosecutor’s comments on a Sept. 11 case were undermining the right of her client to a fair trial.

headline.main: Motion Is Filed to Silence Prosecutor in Sept. 11 Case
headline.print_headline: Motion Is Filed to Silence Prosecutor in Sept. 11 Case
